description: Current MLH Production Engineering Fellow, Fullstack developer, but above all, developer for life.

experience.title: Fullstack Developer with Backend Emphasis
experience.description: Developed a platform that integrates AI/ML in SMEs in order to virtualize the economy through a marketplace as well as a dashboard where the SME can organize its inventory, human resources, shipments, income and expenses, all with the help of AI/ML. Using technologies such as Angular, Ionic, Typescript, Cordova and SQL

projects.title: 365 Days of Code
projects.description: Personal challenge which consisted of learning something new about programming every day, no matter the subject, just learning. I learned about multiple topics such as Machine Learning,cybersecurity, Competitive Programming, Web, Game and Mobile development.

projects.title: Club Algoritmia GDA Fullstack Project

achievements.title: 2nd Place at HackMX Hackaton, Konfio

achievements.title: 2nd Place at Talent Land Hackaton, Bosch
